callback.doc: This optional parameter allows you to specify a JavaScript function to handle query results for pure client-side implementations.Embed the API query in script tags.Define the callback function in script tags.See REST from JavaScript in the Getting Started document for an example.

prettyprint.doc: If prettyprint=true, the results returned by the server will be human readable (pretty printed).Default: prettyprint=true.

q.doc: The text to be detected.You can repeat this parameter more than once in a single request to detect multiple texts.

target.doc: The language of the language name and sorting order.If a language is not specified, the system will not return the language name and the sorting order will based on the language code.

callback.doc: This optional parameter allows you to specify a JavaScript function to handle query results for pure client-side implementations.Embed the API query in script tags.Define the callback function in script tags.See REST from JavaScript in the Getting Started document for an example.

prettyprint.doc: If prettyprint=true, the results returned by the server will be human readable (pretty printed).Default: prettyprint=true.

source.doc: The language of the source text. The value should be one of the language codes listed in Language reference.If a language is not specified, the system will attempt to identify the source language automatically.

target.doc: The language to translate the source text into. The value should be one of the language codes listed in Language reference.

q.doc: The text to be translated.You can repeat this parameter more than once in a single request to translate multiple texts.

callback.doc: This optional parameter allows you to specify a JavaScript function to handle query results for pure client-side implementations.Embed the API query in script tags.Define the callback function in script tags.See REST from JavaScript in the Getting Started document for an example.

format.doc: This optional parameter allows you to indicate that the text to be translated is either plain-text or HTML. A value of html indicates HTML and a value of text indicates plain-text.Default: format=html.

prettyprint.doc: If prettyprint=true, the results returned by the server will be human readable (pretty printed).Default: prettyprint=true.
